At the age of 25, to have the opportunity to travel the world and experience different cultures before settling down.
At the age of 35, to have the chance to achieve my career goals and be financially stable before starting a family.
At the age of 45, to have the opportunity to have a family and watch my children grow up.
At the age of 55, to have the chance to retire and enjoy the fruits of my labor.
At the age of 65, to have the opportunity to spend time with my grandchildren and watch them grow up.
